Preceded by the [[[event-featured-archive|Event Features]]] from 2015 to 2018, this archive displays all works that have been featured on the siteâ€™s front page as part of the Reviewersâ€™ Spotlight, which acknowledges the time and effort spent by forum reviewers helping authors develop and edit their works for the mainsite. 

Each month, community members are encouraged to nominate forum reviewers who have been both particularly helpful and active. Members of the Forum Critique Team will then discuss the nominations, and select four prominent reviewers to choose the monthâ€™s Reviewersâ€™ Spotlight front-page features. 

Nominations and recommendations should be sent via wikidot message to [[*user Zyn]] (team captain of the Critique Team).
